msbt.message: Spending New Year's Day chilling at home, playing checkers with the bugs in the floor is pretty cool.I gotta move their pieces for 'em, though. They don't really understand the rules.
So, it's a new year, yeah? Maaaan I'm so excited for my first dream of the year!I'm gonna dream about snacks that don't exist! And I'm gonna eat 'em! Yummy yummy in my dreamy tummy!
I love yelling "HAPPY NEW YEAR!" at folks! Sometimes I even do it on days that aren't New Year's Day!

I was tryin' to write my New Year's revolutions and came up with the best ideathe PIE REVOLUTION!Sweet or savory, man, it's a whole big-old long year of foods that are only pie!Now I'm gonna start writing my New Year's RESOLUTIONS! I think the first one's gonna be to eat healthy!
New Year's is all about I have no idea!Why do we even need a new year? The old one worked just fine, didn't it?Maybe Grandpa's right Maybe New Years was just invented as an excuse to sell calendars!
